last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 6
last_episode_to_air.overview: Anne is released to await trial, despite the prosecutors' doubts. Anne must face the truth about her actions and finds help from an unexpected source.

name: Sacha
overview: Anne Dupraz, a respected prosecutor in Geneva, is in custody for shooting a man, now between life and death. She admits her guilt but seems unable to explain her act. Her interrogation and that of her relatives will allow Anne to finally free herself from her past.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Prosecutor Anne Dupraz is in police custody after shooting a man and leaving him hovering between life and death.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Anne is suspected of lying and premeditating her act to prevent her victim from revealing her past. Will Anne tell the truth?

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Anne reveals shocking information about her youth and admits that she participated in the investigation of Tessier.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Prosecutors hesitate when Anne's brother Patrick tells them an alternative version of Anne's story.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Just when Carla is starting to believe Anne, ballistics analysis reveals damning new evidence, which undermines Anne's story.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Anne is released to await trial, despite the prosecutors' doubts. Anne must face the truth about her actions and finds help from an unexpected source.
